New Records: Graham Hume starred with a three-wicket haul
Key Match Events: Ross Adair smashed a century to lead the Irish batting efforts
Aiden Markram's men were restricted to 185 for nine in 20 overs
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa had eased to an eight-wicket triumph over Ireland in the first match
Post-Match Reflections: Ireland needed to claim victory on Sunday to avoid a series defeat and they did exactly that
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ireland pulled off a superb 10-run win over South Africa, their first against the Proteas in T20 internationals
Ireland level the two-match series 1-1 in Abu Dhabi
